class.name: PlannerFactsAllocentric
class.brief_description: Allocentric Facts - Shared ground truth observable by all personas.
class.description:
Represents shared ground truth that all personas can observe. This includes: - **Terrain facts**: Location-based terrain information (type, difficulty, etc.) - **Shared objects**: Objects visible to all personas - **Public events**: Events observable by all personas - **Entity positions**: Publicly observable entity positions - **Public entity capabilities**: Observable entity capabilities
Unlike ego-centric beliefs (which are persona-specific), allocentric facts represent the shared reality that all personas can observe. This creates the foundation for allocentric execution where plans execute in shared reality.

method.name: add_public_event
method.description: Add a public event observable by all personas.

method.name: add_shared_object
method.description: Add a shared object that all personas can observe.

method.name: clear_all
method.description: Clear all facts (for testing/reset).

method.name: get_all_entity_capabilities_public
method.description: Returns a [Dictionary] of all publicly observable entity capabilities. Structure: entity_id -> Dictionary(capability -> value).

method.name: get_all_entity_positions
method.description: Returns a [Dictionary] of all entity positions. Keys are entity IDs, values are position data.

method.name: get_all_public_event_ids
method.description: Returns an [Array] of all public event IDs.

method.name: get_all_public_events
method.description: Returns a [Dictionary] of all public events. Keys are event IDs, values are event data dictionaries.

method.name: get_all_shared_object_ids
method.description: Returns an [Array] of all shared object IDs.

method.name: get_all_shared_objects
method.description: Returns a [Dictionary] of all shared objects. Keys are object IDs, values are object data dictionaries.

method.name: get_all_terrain_facts
method.description: Returns a [Dictionary] of all terrain facts. Structure: location -> Dictionary(fact_key -> value).

method.name: get_entity_capability_public
method.description: Returns the publicly observable value of a specific capability for an entity. Returns null if the entity or capability does not exist.

method.name: get_entity_position
method.description: Get the publicly observable position of an entity.

method.name: get_public_event
method.description: Get a public event by ID.

method.name: get_shared_object
method.description: Get a shared object by ID.

method.name: get_terrain_fact
method.description: Get a terrain fact for a specific location.

method.name: has_entity_capability_public
method.description: Returns true if the entity has the specified publicly observable capability, false otherwise.

method.name: has_entity_position
method.description: Returns true if the entity has a publicly observable position, false otherwise.

method.name: has_public_event
method.description: Returns true if a public event with the specified ID exists, false otherwise.

method.name: has_shared_object
method.description: Check if a shared object exists.

method.name: has_terrain_fact
method.description: Check if a terrain fact exists for a location.

method.name: observe_entity_capabilities
method.description: Observe all publicly visible entity capabilities (all personas can use this).

method.name: observe_entity_positions
method.description: Observe all entity positions (all personas can use this).

method.name: observe_public_events
method.description: Observe all public events (all personas can use this).

method.name: observe_shared_objects
method.description: Observe shared objects. If location is empty, returns all objects. Otherwise filters by location.

method.name: observe_terrain
method.description: Observe terrain facts for a location (all personas can use this).

method.name: remove_public_event
method.description: Removes a public event from the allocentric facts.

method.name: remove_shared_object
method.description: Removes a shared object from the allocentric facts.

method.name: set_entity_capability_public
method.description: Sets a publicly observable capability value for an entity. All personas can observe this capability.

method.name: set_entity_position
method.description: Set the publicly observable position of an entity.

method.name: set_terrain_fact
method.description: Set a terrain fact for a specific location.
